desc: Developed a Flask-RESTX API server integrated with a MongoDB database for a messaging app, deployed on a cloud server
Created automated tests for all backend functions and API endpoints, ensuring robust functionality
Designed and implemented an interactive and dynamic React TypeScript interface, ensuring a seamless user experience for sending messages and real-time updates
Programmed Adafruit Circuit Playground Classic to detect Parkinson's Disease tremors and notify users about them
Designed and developed a PHP web application that enables efficient data management with a MySQL database, focusing on seamless user interface design and user experience
Deployed the application on Amazon Web Services
Built a C++ program that takes E20 assembly code, translates it to machine code, and simulates its behavior
